attributes.action: make Global Warming compulsory in the National Curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 14-19 Education and Skills White paper says the bill is a "once-in-a-generation chance" to improve our education system.  Yet the single greatest issue which will affect pupils in their lifetime can be ignored if schools so wish. The science of Global Warming, its consequences and what to do about it should be made compulsory in the National Curricula for Science, Geography and PSHCE.  Next time it may be too late.
